name: openwerewolf
description: An open source, online multiplayer werewolf game.

scripts.watch:debug:
tsc 
 webpack --watch & 
 tsc --watch & 
 sass --watch client/css/main.scss:client/css/main.css & 
 nodemon app.js debug
scripts.watch:
tsc 
 webpack --watch & 
 tsc --watch & 
 sass --watch client/css/main.scss:client/css/main.css & 
 nodemon app.js
scripts.watch:database:
tsc 
 webpack --watch & 
 tsc --watch & 
 sass --watch client/css/main.scss:client/css/main.css & 
 nodemon app.js database
scripts.builddocs:
typedoc --out docs --mode 'file' --excludeExternals --externalPattern "**/node_modules/**" --ignoreCompilerErrors ../OpenWerewolf/Core --target es6 --theme default --readme none 
 touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.start:
echo "*** Please 'npm run build' first if you haven't already!***" 
 node app.js
scripts.start:database:
echo "*** Please 'npm run build' first if you haven't already!***" 
 node app.js database
scripts.start:debug:
echo "*** Please 'npm run build' first if you haven't already!***" 
 node app.js debug

author: James Vaughan Craster
